title: Analyzing a New Phishing Kit
description: A threat intelligence analyst discovers a new phishing kit being sold on a dark web forum and must analyze it to develop countermeasures.

tasks.description: Safely acquire the phishing kit from the dark web forum.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully and securely downloads the kit.

tasks.description: Analyze the kit's source code to understand how it works and what brands it is designed to impersonate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst determines the kit impersonates Microsoft 365 and uses a novel technique to bypass MFA.

tasks.description: Write a detailed intelligence report on the new phishing kit and share it with industry partners and internal security teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst produces a valuable report that helps the broader community defend against this new threat.
